formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: You have tuned your volume by adding options to it. You can change the options for your storage volume.

step.para: Select the volume that you want to edit, and click the Volume Options tab from the Details pane.
The Volume Options tab displays a list of options set for the volume.
Select the option you want to edit. Click Edit. The Edit Option dialog box displays. Enter a new value for the option.
The edited option displays in the Volume Options tab.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: You have changed the options on your volume.
